-/scripts/windows_setup. ps1”
-env’ as needed (see Capture/Input and Window sections)
“uvicorn app.main:app --reload”

~ Use the UI Start/Pause/Stop buttons to control the agent

Backend (FastaPT;

1. Greate environment and install deps: ~postry install” (or “uv pip install -r requirements. txt”).
2. Configure ~.cnv’ (OCR language, search provider keys, paths).

3. “uvicorn app.main:app --reload’ .

4. Optional: start Ray for parallelism: “ray start --head’ and set “PARALLEL MODE-ray”.

5. Set LLM provider keys (as needed): “OPENAT_API_KEY", “ANTHROPIC_API_KEY", or configure local “ollamna’.

UL (React/TypeScript):

1. "ed ui && pnpm install” (or mpm/yarn).
2. “pnpm dev” to start the UI it connects to the backend via WebSocket/REST.

Emulator:

|. Install and Iaunch your emulator; enable ADB.
2. Calibrate capture and input (resolution, DPI, window title); store settings in config.
3. Set concurrency knobs: frames per second, OCR batch size, and max parallel agents.

‘#84 Windows window capture (Google Play Games Beta)

~ Set environment variables in ~.cny” if needed:
= “CAPTURE _BACKEND=auto” (default) will try ADB first, then window capture
~ *CAPTURE_BACKEND=window” forces window capture
~ “WINDOW _TITLE_HINT=Google Play Ganes|Epic Seven|Epic 7” can be @ regex or simple text to match the emulator window title
= “WINDOW_ENFORCE_TOPMOST=true” keeps the window O- tm~ ctecinw canton
= “WINDOW_LEFT=100" , “WINDOW _TOP=100", “WINDOW_CLI ~ 2/2 Kea) 7 <1/Sries > fixed position and client-area size
~ Ensure the emulator window is visible (not minimizeuy «1
